entities.description: Represents the total number of arrestee segments recorded.
The unweighted frequency count of each segment.
The percentage of each segment relative to the total cases.
Various statistical measures for the data, including mean, median, mode, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation.
The type of the variable, in this case, numeric.
The range of missing values for this variable.

relationships.description: Relates the total arrestee segments to their respective unweighted frequency counts.
Relates the total arrestee segments to their respective percentages of the total cases.
Links the total arrestee segments to the various statistical measures describing the data.
Indicates the type of variable, in this case, numeric.
Relates the total arrestee segments to the range of missing values for the data.
